body.head: <meta name="author" content="Viktor Tovstyi"> <meta property="og:title" content="${title}"> <meta property="og:image" content="https://machai.machanism.org/images/machai-social.png" /> <meta property="og:description" content="Machai is an advanced ecosystem for automated library metadata management, semantic search, and intelligent project assembly.
